text: The California State Assembly is the lower house of the California State Legislature. It has 80 members. The assembly is currently controlled by the Democratic Party. It meets at the California State Capitol in Sacramento. == Composition == 61 1 18 Democratic Ind Republican Affiliation Party (Shading indicates majority caucus) Party (Shading indicates majority caucus) Party (Shading indicates majority caucus) Total Affiliation Total Affiliation Democratic Republican Independent Total Vacant End of previous legislature 61 17 1 79 1 Begin 60 19 1 80 0 Latest Sergeant-at-Arms Alisa Buckley Chaplain Reverend Patti Oshita (Buddhist Churches of America) The Chief Clerk, the acting Chief Sergeant-at-Arms, and the Chaplains are not members of the Legislature.
